question: Umme Salma...she became wife of Best human being on earth! Dua; "Inna lillahi wa inna ilaihi rajeoon. Allahummajalni farajawn wa makhrajan war zuqni khaira min haiso ahtasib ... provide meaning of dua
answer:
QUESTION
There is a story that ; Janabe Umme Salma in her difficulty she requested the Prophet(sal) for a dua. The prophet asked her to recite this Dua . As a result she became the wife of the Best human being on earth! The Dua is; "Inna lillahi wa inna ilaihi raje oon .Allahummajalni farajawn wa makhrajan war zuqni khaira min haiso ahtasibo wa min haiso la ahtasib , be haqqe Mohammadin wa ale mohammad" Please provide the meaning of the above dua.
ANSWER


Share:
Translation: Verily to Allah do we belong and to Him is our return. O Allah`
Grant me ease and grant me a better one from where I can imagine and where I
cannot even imagine, through the right of Muhammad (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) and the family of Muhammad (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).'

However, it may be useful to mention that we have not been able to trace
these exact words in any narration. Kindly provide your source.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Muhammad ibn Moulana Haroon Abbassommar
FACULTY OF SPECIALTY IN HADITH
